summary.para: Contains classes and enumerations that are used to implement the main functionality of WinForms and WPF PDF Viewers, and the PDF Document API.
Implements options used to obtain information common for annotation types.

summary.para: Contains filters that can be applied to annotations.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfCommentFilter.Authors

summary.para: Retrieves a list of authors whose annotations should be displayed.

member.value: A list of annotation authors.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfCommentFilter.Checked

summary.para: Specifies whether to show checked annotations.

member.value: true to apply this filter; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Clears all applied filters.
Clears all applied filters without notification.
Fires when the filter has been changed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfCommentFilter.HideAll

summary.para: Specifies whether to hide all annotations and comments.

member.value: true to hide all annotations; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfCommentFilter.NoneStatus

summary.para: Specifies whether to show annotations whose review status is None.

member.value: true to apply this filter; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfCommentFilter.SearchText

summary.para: Gets or sets the text used to filter annotations.

member.value: The text that annotations should contain.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfCommentFilter.Statuses

summary.para: Retrieves a list of statuses by which to filter the annotations.

member.value: A list of statuses.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfCommentFilter.Types

summary.para: Retrieves a list of types by which to filter the annotations.

member.value: A list of types.

summary.para: Lists values used to specify the annotation’s sort mode in the Comments pane.
Annotations are sorted by author.
Annotations are sorted by checkmark status (checked or unchecked).
Annotations are sorted by date.
Annotations are sorted by page.
Annotations are sorted by type.
Allows you to draw graphics content on a PDF page.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfGraphics.AddFormField(DevExpress.Pdf.PdfGraphicsAcroFormField)

summary.para: Adds an interactive form field as graphics content.

member.param: An interactive form field that should be added.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfGraphics.AddLinkToPage(System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)

summary.para: Adds a link that refers to the document page with the specified number. Allows you to set the page point positioned at the top left corner of the document window, and zoom factor.

member.param: A page area (in world coordinate system) where you can add a link.
The page number.
The horizontal coordinate of a page point (in the world coordinate system) positioned at the top left corner of the document window.
The vertical coordinate of a page point (in the world coordinate system) positioned at the top left corner of the document window.
The zoom factor by which the document is scaled after you click a link.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfGraphics.AddLinkToPage(System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single)

summary.para: Adds a link that refers to the document page with the specified number. Allows you to set a page point positioned at the top left corner of the document window.

member.param: A page area (in the world coordinate system) where you can add a link.
The page number.
The horizontal coordinate of a target page point (in the world coordinate system) that is positioned at the top left corner of the document window.
The vertical coordinate of a target page point (in the world coordinate system) that is positioned at the top left corner of the document window.

The target page number.
A zoom factor by which the document is scaled after you click a link.

The page number.

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable the legacy printing engine.

member.value: true to use the old printing engine; otherwise - false.

summary.para: Specifies the PDF document page numbers to be printed.

member.value: An array of integer values that correspond to page numbers.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrinterSettings.PageOrientation

member.value: A value. The default value is PdfPrintPageOrientation.Auto.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrinterSettings.PrintingDpi

summary.para: Specifies the dpi value used to print the PDF document.

summary.para: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether to print the document content in grayscale.

member.value: true to print a document content in grayscale; false the current printer settings are used.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrinterSettings.PrintStickyNotes

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to print text markup annotations (sticky notes).

member.value: true to print sticky notes; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrinterSettings.PrintTextAsOutlines

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to print text as character outlines in the DirectX printing engine.

member.value: true to print text as outlines; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrinterSettings.Scale

member.value: A value which represents the scale factor of the document page (the scale is measured as a percentage).

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrinterSettings.ScaleMode

summary.para: Specifies the page scale mode when a document is printing.

member.value: A value.

summary.para: Provides data for the PdfViewer.PrintPage and PdfDocumentProcessor.PrintPage events.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrintPageEventArgs.PageCount

summary.para: Returns the total number of pages which were sent to the printer.

member.value: An integer value which represents the total number of pages which were sent to the printer.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrintPageEventArgs.PageNumber

summary.para: Returns the page number of the currently printed page.

member.value: An integer value that is the page number.

member.name: T:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfPrintPageEventHandler

summary.para: A method that will handle the PdfViewer.PrintPage and PdfDocumentProcessor.PrintPage events.

member.param: The event source. This parameter identifies either the or which raised the event.
A object that contains event data.

summary.para: Lists the available document orientation modes.
The orientation is defined automatically to fit the page content to the specific paper type.
Orientation of the document pages is landscape.
Orientation of the document pages is portrait.
Lists the available document scale modes.
A printed page is not scaled.
A printed page is scaled by a specified percentage scale factor.
A printed page is scaled to fit a specific paper size.
Provides data for the PdfViewer.QueryPageSettings and PdfDocumentProcessor.QueryPageSettings events.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfQueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageNumber

summary.para: Gets the page number in a document.

member.value: An integer value, specifying the page number.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfQueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSize

summary.para: Gets the size of the current page.

member.value: A value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfQueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PrintInGrayscale

summary.para: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether to print the document content in grayscale.

member.value: true to print a document content in grayscale; false the current printer settings are used.

member.name: T:DevExpress.Pdf.PdfQueryPageSettingsEventHandler

summary.para: A method that will handle the PdfDocumentProcessor.QueryPageSettings and PdfViewer.QueryPageSettings events.

member.param: The event source. This parameter identifies either the or which raised the event.
A object that contains event data.

summary.para: Lists values used to specify the rendering engine.
Default rendering engine.
DirectX hardware rendering engine.
DirectX software rendering engine.
GDI/GDI+ rendering engine.
Skia graphics engine.
